and.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM workbench_sidebar_category_link WHERE tool_name = 'manage_germplasm_lists' and rank = 3

changeSet.sql: UPDATE workbench_sidebar_category_link SET rank = 1 WHERE tool_name = 'manage_germplasm_lists'; UPDATE workbench_sidebar_category_link SET rank = 3 WHERE tool_name = 'bm_list_manager_main';
